About

Hej! Hello! Bonjour! Goeiedag!

I'm Hadrien Gourlé, bioinformatician and PhD-student at the Swedish University of Agricultural Sciences In Uppsala, Sweden.

My PhD is about assessing the anthropogenic impact on West Indian Ocean coral reefs.

You can find me on Github, Twitter, Google+ and linkedin.
